products.title: Verona Prime 25mm Black Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A classic shade, this black perfect fit venetian blind adds an modern look to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

products.title: Turin 25mm Jet Black Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of turin 25mm aluminium perfect fit venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This jet black perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold black shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wooden accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with upvc windows and doors, as they are drill and screw-free - perfect for protecting the frame warranty.

products.title: Turin 25mm Perforated Black Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finishes in a full spectrum of colour means we are sure you will find something for you. This black venetian blind will look great in any room in your home and will blend into most decors. Product id: db-dpfven0347 fabric colour: perf filtra black s25001 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.title: Turin 25mm Gloss Black Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finishes in a full spectrum of colour means we are sure you will find something for you. Available 21cm 300cm wide & up to 300cm drop. This black venetian blind will fit into most colour schemes or can be used to create a contrast in any room in your home. Product id: db-dpfven0305 fabric colour: gloss black s25083 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.title: Kana Black Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their kana collection of pleated free-hanging blinds features all of their favourite contemporary neutrals and bright colours. Their black is a deep, bold colour perfect for a modern and sophisticated space and for anyone who wants a dramatic look. Product id: sdb-pfp0168 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - added thermal retention due to framework light filtering: yes kana black perfect fit pleated blind in black.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Black Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their black colour - a perfect bold choice for any room that you want to dim the light in a little more.

products.title: Infusion Solar Black Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. One of their deepest black shades, this colour is great for allowing some light through while creating a bold, modern finish. Product id: db-nfpl0003 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
